description:
The ten members of B-PROJECT have come to a tropical island to take pictures for their fan book. During the shoot, they are suddenly assailed by a storm, and the cruiser carrying the members is swept away.
After the storm disperses, the members find themselves on a desert island. Unable to get in touch with Tsubasa or the film crew, Masunaga exercises his leadership skills by assigning jobs to the other members so they can wait to be rescued in security and safety. However, his own eyes are directed towards Kitakado`s back.
Source: crunchyroll
